tool_description: Processes bank statements to analyze cash flow patterns, deposit consistency, and financial behavior for underwriting assessment.

statement_period_start.description: Start date of bank statement period

statement_period_end.description: End date of bank statement period

transaction_data.description: Array of transaction amounts (positive for credits, negative for debits)

deposit_dates.description: Array of deposit dates in ISO format

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and within last 2 years
Balance mismatch: Opening balance plus net transactions should equal closing balance
Insufficient transaction data: Need at least 30 days of transaction history
Date array mismatch: Number of deposit dates must correspond to positive transactions
Invalid account type: Use one of [checking, savings, business]
usage: Provide statement dates, balances, transaction_data array, and deposit_dates array. Optionally specify account_type and minimum_balance_threshold. Returns comprehensive cash flow analysis and behavioral patterns.

deposit_consistency_score.description: Score from 0-100 indicating regularity of deposits

average_balance.description: Average account balance over the period

overdraft_incidents.description: Number of times balance went below minimum threshold

cash_flow_volatility.description: Measure of cash flow volatility (standard deviation of monthly flows)

financial_behavior_flags.description: Array of notable financial behavior observations
